# teal.modules.clinical

[![CRAN
Version](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/teal.modules.clinical?color=green)](https://cran.r-project.org/package=teal.modules.clinical)

Downloads](http://cranlogs.r-pkg.org/badges/last-week/teal.modules.clinical?color=green)](https://cran.r-project.org/package=teal.modules.clinical)

being actively
developed.](https://www.repostatus.org/badges/latest/active.svg)](https://www.repostatus.org/#active)
[![Current
Version](https://img.shields.io/github/r-package/v/insightsengineering/teal.modules.clinical/main?color=purple&label=package%20version)](https://github.com/insightsengineering/teal.modules.clinical/tree/main)
[![Open
Issues](https://img.shields.io/github/issues-raw/insightsengineering/teal.modules.clinical?color=red&label=open%20issues)](https://github.com/insightsengineering/teal.modules.clinical/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+sort%3Aupdated-desc)

This package contains a set of standard `teal` modules to be used with
`CDISC` data in order to generate many of the standard outputs used in
clinical trials.

These modules include, but are not limited to:

- Data visualizations:
  - Forest plots
    ([`tm_g_forest_rsp()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_g_forest_rsp.md)/[`tm_g_forest_tte()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_g_forest_tte.md))
  - Line plots
    ([`tm_g_lineplot()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_g_lineplot.md))
  - Kaplan-Meier plots
    ([`tm_g_km()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_g_km.md))
  - â€¦
- Statistical model fits:
  - MMRM
    ([`tm_a_mmrm()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_a_mmrm.md))
  - Logistic regression
    ([`tm_t_logistic()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_t_logistic.md))
  - Cox regression
    ([`tm_t_coxreg()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_t_coxreg.md))
  - â€¦
- Summary tables:
  - Unique patients
    ([`tm_t_summary()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_t_summary.md))
  - Exposure across patients
    ([`tm_t_exposure()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_t_exposure.md))
  - Change from baseline for parameters
    ([`tm_t_summary_by()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_t_summary_by.md))
  - â€¦
- Patient-level profile modules:
  - Table of basic information about chosen patient
    ([`tm_t_pp_basic_info()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_t_pp_basic_info.md))
  - Plot of patient vitals over time
    ([`tm_g_pp_vitals()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_g_pp_vitals.md))
  - General timeline for individual patients
    ([`tm_g_pp_patient_timeline()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_g_pp_patient_timeline.md))
  - â€¦

Most modules in the package are implemented using functions from the R
package [`tern`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/tern/) in order
to produce their output.

Please see the [Teal
Gallery](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.gallery/) and [TLG
Catalog](https://insightsengineering.github.io/tlg-catalog/) for
examples of `shiny` apps created using modules from this package.

## Installation

``` r
install.packages('teal.modules.clinical')
```

Alternatively, you might want to use the development version.

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("insightsengineering/teal.modules.clinical")
```

## Usage

To understand how to use this package, please refer to the [Getting
Started](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/latest-tag/articles/teal-modules-clinical.html)
article, which provides multiple examples of code implementation.

## Playground

You can try out the package without installing it in the Shinylive:

- [stable](https://shinylive.io/r/editor/#code=NobwRAdghgtgpmAXGKAHVA6ASmANGAYwHsIAXOMpMAGwEsAjAJykYE8AKcqajGIgEwCu1OAGcMBOhFoFuASgA6EMAF8AukA)
- [development](https://shinylive.io/r/editor/#code=NobwRAdghgtgpmAXGKAHVA6ASmANGAYwHsIAXOMpMI1UgSxIGcAKAdzgCMAnAfVQGsA5jy5xURRgAIAvJILMAOmC4BaAK4Q6ANzhdGcJTMlKAFqVKpGiAPTXUJqFxhQdeuBlUbtu-RgAmcFpKuJKCcKQA8rQMEIpg7Nx8QiJiEkoAlJkKEAA2dNyOAJ7M5FA5GDBEfmo5cIwYBHmaBGXp2WAAvgC6QA)

## Getting help

If you encounter a bug or have a feature request, please file an issue.
For questions, discussions, and staying up to date, please use the
`teal` channel in the [`pharmaverse` slack
workspace](https://pharmaverse.slack.com).

## Acknowledgment

This package is the result of the joint efforts of many developers and
stakeholders. We would like to thank everyone who has contributed so
far!

# Package index

- [`teal.modules.clinical`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/teal.modules.clinical-package.md)
  [`teal.modules.clinical-package`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/teal.modules.clinical-package.md)
  :

  `teal` Modules for Standard Clinical Outputs

## Tables

- [`tm_t_abnormality()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_t_abnormality.md)
  : teal Module: Abnormality Summary Table
- [`tm_t_abnormality_by_worst_grade()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_t_abnormality_by_worst_grade.md)
  : teal Module: Laboratory test results with highest grade
  post-baseline
- [`tm_t_ancova()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_t_ancova.md)
  : teal Module: ANCOVA Summary
- [`tm_t_binary_outcome()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_t_binary_outcome.md)
  : teal Module: Binary Outcome Table
- [`tm_t_coxreg()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_t_coxreg.md)
  : teal Module: Cox Regression Model
- [`tm_t_events()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_t_events.md)
  : teal Module: Events by Term
- [`tm_t_events_by_grade()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_t_events_by_grade.md)
  : teal Module: Events by Grade
- [`tm_t_events_patyear()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_t_events_patyear.md)
  : teal Module: Event Rates Adjusted for Patient-Years
- [`tm_t_events_summary()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_t_events_summary.md)
  : teal Module: Adverse Events Summary
- [`tm_t_exposure()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_t_exposure.md)
  : teal Module: Exposure Table for Risk management plan
- [`tm_t_glm_counts()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_t_glm_counts.md)
  : Teal Module: Regression Counts Summary
- [`tm_t_logistic()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_t_logistic.md)
  : teal Module: Logistic Regression
- [`tm_t_mult_events()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_t_mult_events.md)
  : teal Module: Multiple Events by Term
- [`tm_t_pp_basic_info()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_t_pp_basic_info.md)
  : teal Module: Patient Profile Basic Info
- [`tm_t_pp_laboratory()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_t_pp_laboratory.md)
  : teal Module: Patient Profile Laboratory Table
- [`tm_t_pp_medical_history()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_t_pp_medical_history.md)
  : teal Module: Patient Profile Medical History
- [`tm_t_pp_prior_medication()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_t_pp_prior_medication.md)
  : teal Module: Patient Profile Prior Medication
- [`tm_t_shift_by_arm()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_t_shift_by_arm.md)
  : teal Module: Shift by Arm
- [`tm_t_shift_by_arm_by_worst()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_t_shift_by_arm_by_worst.md)
  : teal Module: Shift by Arm by Worst Analysis Indicator Level
- [`tm_t_shift_by_grade()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_t_shift_by_grade.md)
  : teal Module: Grade Summary Table
- [`tm_t_smq()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_t_smq.md)
  : teal Module: Adverse Events Table by Standardized MedDRA Query
- [`tm_t_summary()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_t_summary.md)
  : teal Module: Summary of Variables
- [`tm_t_summary_by()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_t_summary_by.md)
  : teal Module: Summarize Variables by Row Groups
- [`tm_t_tte()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_t_tte.md)
  : teal Module: Time-To-Event Table

## Graphs

- [`tm_g_barchart_simple()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_g_barchart_simple.md)
  : teal Module: Simple Bar Chart and Table of Counts per Category
- [`tm_g_ci()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_g_ci.md)
  : teal Module: Confidence Interval Plot
- [`tm_g_forest_rsp()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_g_forest_rsp.md)
  : teal Module: Forest Response Plot
- [`tm_g_forest_tte()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_g_forest_tte.md)
  : teal Module: Forest Survival Plot
- [`tm_g_ipp()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_g_ipp.md)
  : teal Module: Individual Patient Plots
- [`tm_g_km()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_g_km.md)
  : teal Module: Kaplan-Meier Plot
- [`tm_g_lineplot()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_g_lineplot.md)
  : teal Module: Line Plot
- [`tm_g_pp_adverse_events()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_g_pp_adverse_events.md)
  : teal Module: Patient Profile Adverse Events Table and Plot
- [`tm_g_pp_patient_timeline()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_g_pp_patient_timeline.md)
  : teal Module: Patient Profile Timeline Plot
- [`tm_g_pp_therapy()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_g_pp_therapy.md)
  : teal Module: Patient Profile Therapy Table and Plot
- [`tm_g_pp_vitals()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_g_pp_vitals.md)
  : teal Module: Patient Profile Vitals Plot

## General analyses

- [`tm_a_gee()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_a_gee.md)
  : teal Module: Generalized Estimating Equations (GEE) analysis
- [`tm_a_mmrm()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_a_mmrm.md)
  : teal Module: Mixed Model Repeated Measurements (MMRM) Analysis

## Patient profile modules

- [`tm_g_pp_adverse_events()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_g_pp_adverse_events.md)
  : teal Module: Patient Profile Adverse Events Table and Plot
- [`tm_g_pp_patient_timeline()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_g_pp_patient_timeline.md)
  : teal Module: Patient Profile Timeline Plot
- [`tm_g_pp_therapy()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_g_pp_therapy.md)
  : teal Module: Patient Profile Therapy Table and Plot
- [`tm_g_pp_vitals()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_g_pp_vitals.md)
  : teal Module: Patient Profile Vitals Plot
- [`tm_t_pp_basic_info()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_t_pp_basic_info.md)
  : teal Module: Patient Profile Basic Info
- [`tm_t_pp_laboratory()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_t_pp_laboratory.md)
  : teal Module: Patient Profile Laboratory Table
- [`tm_t_pp_medical_history()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_t_pp_medical_history.md)
  : teal Module: Patient Profile Medical History
- [`tm_t_pp_prior_medication()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/tm_t_pp_prior_medication.md)
  : teal Module: Patient Profile Prior Medication

## Helper functions

- [`add_expr()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/add_expr.md)
  : Expression List

- [`as_num()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/as_num.md)
  : Parse text input to numeric vector

- [`bracket_expr()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/bracket_expr.md)
  : Expressions in Brackets

- [`call_concatenate()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/call_concatenate.md)
  : Concatenate expressions via a binary operator

- [`clean_description()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/clean_description.md)
  : Clean up categorical variable description

- [`color_lab_values()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/color_lab_values.md)
  : Mapping function for Laboratory Table

- [`column_annotation_label()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/column_annotation_label.md)
  : Get full label, useful for annotating plots

- [`cs_to_des_filter()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/cs_to_des_filter.md)
  : Convert choices_selected to data_extract_spec with only filter_spec

- [`cs_to_des_select()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/cs_to_des_select.md)
  : Convert choices_selected to data_extract_spec with only select_spec

- [`cs_to_filter_spec()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/cs_to_filter_spec.md)
  : Convert choices_selected to filter_spec

- [`cs_to_select_spec()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/cs_to_select_spec.md)
  : Convert choices_selected to select_spec

- [`default_total_label()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/default_total_label.md)
  [`set_default_total_label()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/default_total_label.md)
  : Default string for total column label

- [`extract_input()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/extract_input.md)
  :

  Extracts html id for `data_extract_ui`

- [`get_var_labels()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/get_var_labels.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Get variable labels

- [`h_concat_expr()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/h_concat_expr.md)
  : Expression Deparsing

- [`is.cs_or_des()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/is.cs_or_des.md)
  :

  Whether object is of class
  [`teal.transform::choices_selected()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.transform/latest-tag/reference/choices_selected.html)

- [`pipe_expr()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/pipe_expr.md)
  : Expressions as a Pipeline

- [`prepare_arm()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/prepare_arm.md)
  : Expression: Arm Preparation

- [`prepare_arm_levels()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/prepare_arm_levels.md)
  : Expression: Prepare Arm Levels

- [`split_choices()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/split_choices.md)
  :

  Split `choices_selected` objects with interactions into their
  component variables

- [`split_col_expr()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/split_col_expr.md)
  : Split-Column Expression

- [`split_interactions()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/split_interactions.md)
  : Split interaction terms into their component variables

## Data

Data included in the package.

- [`tmc_ex_adsl`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/ex_data.md)
  [`tmc_ex_adae`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/ex_data.md)
  [`tmc_ex_adaette`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/ex_data.md)
  [`tmc_ex_adcm`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/ex_data.md)
  [`tmc_ex_adeg`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/ex_data.md)
  [`tmc_ex_adex`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/ex_data.md)
  [`tmc_ex_adlb`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/ex_data.md)
  [`tmc_ex_admh`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/ex_data.md)
  [`tmc_ex_adqs`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/ex_data.md)
  [`tmc_ex_adrs`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/ex_data.md)
  [`tmc_ex_adtte`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/ex_data.md)
  [`tmc_ex_advs`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/reference/ex_data.md)
  :

  Simulated `CDISC` Data for Examples

  {teal.modules.clinical}](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/articles/teal-modules-clinical.md):
